dashboard.analyticsDescription: View business analytics, sales reports, and performance metrics.

orders.title: Orders Management
orders.noOrdersFound: No orders found matching your criteria.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.noItems: No inventory items found. Add your first inventory item to get started.
inventory.noLocationsError: You must add at least one business location before adding inventory items.
inventory.confirmDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this inventory item? This action cannot be undone.
inventory.minOrderQuantityInvalid: Minimum order quantity must be a positive number
inventory.maxOrderQuantityInvalid: Maximum order quantity must be greater than minimum
inventory.pleaseFixValidationErrors: Please fix validation errors before saving

locations.title: Business Locations
locations.name: Location Name
locations.noLocations: No business locations found. Add your first location to get started.
locations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this location? This action cannot be undone.
locations.primaryLocationWarning: This is your primary location. You must set another location as primary before deleting this one.

items.title: Items Management
items.noItems: No items found. Add your first item to get started.
items.noLocationsError: You must add at least one business location before adding items.

csvUpload.title: CSV Upload
csvUpload.description: Upload a CSV file to bulk add or update items for your business.
csvUpload.templateDescription: Download our CSV template to ensure your data is formatted correctly.
csvUpload.fileUploadDescription: Select a CSV file to upload. The file should contain item data with headers matching our template.
csvUpload.previewDescription: Review the first 5 rows of your CSV data before uploading.
csvUpload.helpDescription: Your CSV file should include the following columns:
csvUpload.requiredFields: Required fields: name, description, price, currency, item_sub_category_id
csvUpload.optionalFields: Optional fields: sku, size, size_unit, weight, weight_unit, color, material, model, is_fragile, is_perishable, requires_special_handling, min_order_quantity, max_order_quantity, is_active, brand_id
csvUpload.booleanFields: Boolean fields (is_fragile, is_perishable, requires_special_handling, is_active) should be 'true' or 'false'
csvUpload.numberFields: Number fields (price, size, weight, min_order_quantity, max_order_quantity) should be numeric values
csvUpload.currencyValues: Currency should be a valid currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP)
csvUpload.sizeUnits: Size units should be: cm, inch, m, mm, ft, yd
csvUpload.weightUnits: Weight units should be: g, kg, lb, oz
csvUpload.duplicateHandling: If an item with the same name or SKU already exists, it will be updated; otherwise, a new item will be created.

csvUpload.title: CSV Upload
csvUpload.instructions: Upload a CSV file to bulk add or update items. The CSV should have headers matching the item fields. If an item with the same name or SKU already exists, it will be updated; otherwise, a new item will be created. Download the template below to see the required format.
csvUpload.invalidFileType: Please select a valid CSV file
csvUpload.emptyFile: The CSV file is empty or has no data rows
csvUpload.parseError: Error parsing CSV file. Please check the format.
csvUpload.noData: No data to upload. Please select a valid CSV file.

home.title: Rendasua - Your Trusted Business Platform

home.keywords: business platform, inventory management, agent dashboard, business dashboard, client management, order management, Rendasua
